titleStmt.title: SII 12.176: original edition by V. Venkatasubba Ayyar
No. 176. (A.R. No. 80 of 1919). MUṈṈŪR, TINDIVANAM TALUK, SOUTH ARCOT DISTRICT. ON THE SOUTH WALL OF THE WEST PRĀKĀRA (INSIDE) IN THE ĀḌAVALLĒŚVARA TEMPLE.

summary.p: This inscription of the 12th year registers the gift of a lamp-stand of five tiers for burning 10 lamps in the temple of Uḍaiyār Āḍavalla-Nāyaṉār at Muññūr alias Rājanārāyaṇa-chaturvēdimaṅgalam, by Ambaruḍaiyāṉ Mādēvaṉ Kulōttuṅgaśōḻa-Mūvēndavēḷān of Ambar in Ambar-nāḍu, a subdivision of Uyyakkoṇḍār-vaḷanāḍu in Śōḻa-maṇḍalam. The donor also purchased 750 kuḻi of land and gave it as tiruviḷakkuppaṭṭi to the Śivabrāhmaṇas of the temple who agreed to maintain the ten lamps from evening till midnight in the temple.

Before the time of Rājarāja III, the god at Muṉṉūr was known as Mūlasthānamuḍaiya-Mahādēva (Nos. 65 and 67 of 1919). The village Ambar may be identified with Ambal in the Nannilam taluk, Tanjore district.

revisionDesc.change: Further conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)
Conversion of digital encoding to DHARMA encoding scheme according to EGD (Encoding Guide for Diplomatic Editions)

div.p:
svasti śrī . cakalapuvaṉaccakkaravattikaḷ śrī kopperuñciṅkatevaṟku yāṇṭu 10 2vatu muñ ñūṟāṉa Irācanārāyaṇaccaturp
petimaṅkalattu Uṭaiyār Āṭavallanāyaṉārkku coḻamaṇṭalattu Uyyakkoṇṭārvaḷanāṭṭu Amparnāṭṭu A
mparil Amparuṭaiyāṉ mātevaṉ kulottuṅkacoḻa muventaveḷānen . nāṉ Iṭṭa Añcu nilaik kuttiviḷakkukku nāṉ vai
tta tiruviḷakkup pattum Antiyampoḻtu tuṭaṅki tiruveottacāmam Aṟutiyāka Erikkakaṭa vatāṉa viḷakkukku nāṉ koṇṭu viṭṭa
Iṉṉāyaṉār tirunāmattukkāṇiyun tevatāṉamumāṉa nilattil nāṉ vilaikoṇṭuṭaiya tiraiy lokkiyamātevi vatikku kiḻakku
Apimāṉameruvāykkālukku teṟku yiraṇiyān kuḻi 2 100 5 10 kiḻmuraṇṭi kuḻi 3 100 5 10 tāḻampaṭṭi Eṉṟu perkūvappaṭṭa nilam kuḻi 100 5 10m
Āka kuḻi 7 100 5 10 Ikkuḻi Eḻunūṟṟaimpatum nāṉ vilaikoṇṭapapaṭiye tiruviḷakkupaṭṭiyāka Ikkoyil civappi
rāmaṇar kaikkoṇṭu Antiyampoḻtu tuṭaṅki tiruvottacāma maṟutiyāka Erikkakaṭavatāka Ippaṭikku cantirātittavarai E
rikkakaṭavarkaḷāka Icaintapaṭiye tiruviḷakkuppaṭṭiyāka Innilam koṇṭu viṭṭeṉ Uṭaiyār Āṭavallanāyaṉāṟkku kulo
ttuṅkacoḻa muventaveḷāṉeṉ .
Digital edition of SII 12.176 by converted to DHARMA conventions by Emmanuel Francis.
